intro_lesson1_paragraph1: <highlight>@criptovaluta</highlight>info es una forma digital<highlight>deneg</highlight><highlight>, que funciona sin intermediarios:</highlight>banks<highlight>@, entidades estatales o plataformas centralizadas. Se transmite directamente de un hombre a otro a través de </highlight>blockchen@@@. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
intro_lesson1_paragraph2: El primer criptólopo <highlight>Bitcoin</highlight>., que apareció en 2009, responde a la desconfianza en el sistema bancario tras la crisis de 2008, y desde entonces ha aparecido un gran número de otros scripts: <highlight>@Ethereum</highlight>,<highlight>Litecoin</highlight>, <highlight>styblecoin</highlight>@ y otros.
intro_lesson1_paragraph3: La idea principal es que el usuario<highlight>control</highlight>superiodico. para que nadie pueda retirar<highlight>@, </highlight>o@o<highlight>@o</highlight>@o@@ree-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-g-g-e-e-g-e-e-e-e-e-g-g-g-g-e-e-e-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-e-g-g-g-e-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g
